text: AWS has solved lots of challenges for us
at Trager one that comes to mind over
and over again is the challenge of
migrating our iot platform from A system
that was being end of LIF with an
incredibly short timeline we use a lot
of different services on AWS at Trager
the ones that we use the most are Lambda
for all of our compute Kinesis for
logging our events and also broadcas
them to other systems and we also use
Dynamo quite a bit to maintain state
with all of our systems the solutions
that we've built on AWS have benefited
Trager in a few ways the first is cost
we were able to quickly scale up on the
cloud and then do cost optimization with
them to reduce the total cost of our iot
platform the yearly cost went from about
$8 a grill down to 50 cents through
optimizations that we've done the other
benefit that we see with AWS
is rapid development one of the best
things about working with AWS is the
partnership that the account teams
provide to you we love that we have
Solutions Architects that we can call
love that we have a technical account
manager that we can call right we have
people that we can get on the line that
feel the urgency of the problem just
like we do that's something that we
don't get from many
other platforms and frankly it makes AWS
feel like a true partner to us
